title: PC crushes while playing LoL, help needed!
body:
Every time I start a game pc crushes. It restarts, I get the blue screen before the restart. It says something like we're just collecting some info before we restart for you. Also, I'm having bug splats from time to time. 
It works completely normal when I'm doing anything else besides playing.

replies.body:
In my experience in blue screens and games, it's almost always an issue with your graphics card driver. So for example if you have an NVIDIA graphics card in your computer, you'll want to check out NVIDIA's website and make sure that your graphics drivers are up-to-date

> [{quoted}](name=Audhulma,realm=NA,application-id=yrc23zHg,discussion-id=ZBQtnx4s,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-12-07T20:03:41.114+0000)
>
> Would be a good idea to pull your phone or a camera out, and take a picture next time it blue screens. You can google the code to get an idea of what's going on

Also this, telling us the error code will also help pinpoint the issue

Tundra Fizz on point! You should definitely first check out your drivers for any updates and to make sure they were installed properly, but you'll also wanna do some general pc cleanup to make sure it's still running properly. I'd also suggest checking out the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as a precaution!
